MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the G14 and G81 postcode areas of Glasgow and Clydebank. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:26pm. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our emergency response team have now arrived on site. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:48pm on Monday, 08 March 2021
